column2: Removal of Immigration Railroading
All nations in the New World, Oceania, or South Africa will no longer recieve their immigration buff for simply existing after 1900.
A shame.
Civilized Asian Nerf
Civilized player nations in India & China will be getting nerfs to mobilization & pop-growth as the game goes on to compensate for their ludicrious accepted-pop & brigade count.
Damn the acts of attempting to balance Asia.
Early-game Asian Nerf
Civilized player nations in India & China will be getting nerfs to mobilization & pop-growth as the game goes on to compensate for their ludicrious accepted-pop & brigade count.
Damn the acts of attempting to balance Asia.
Mid-game Asian Nerf
Civilized player nations in India & China will be getting nerfs to mobilization & pop-growth as the game goes on to compensate for their ludicrious accepted-pop & brigade count.
Damn the acts of attempting to balance Asia.
Late-game Asian Nerf
Civilized player nations in India & China will be getting nerfs to mobilization & pop-growth as the game goes on to compensate for their ludicrious accepted-pop & brigade count.
Damn the acts of attempting to balance Asia.
Chinese Pop Nerf
China gets a nerf to it's large population to help with balance & late-game lag.
Damn the acts of attempting to balance Asia.
Zhourao Liferating Increase
With all of Australia now controlled, low liferating provinces will have their liferating increased.
Excellent.
Midwest Liferating Increase
With Midwest & Central North America colonized, provinces in the region will have their liferating increased
Excellent.
Americas, South Africa, Oceania Liferating Increase
To compensate for immigration railroading being turned off in 1900 & some lopsided liferating in some areas, liferating is increased across the board.
Let the Buffing Commence.
Scandinavian Cores Liferating Increase
To compensate for low liferating in some provinces, and due to it's multi-front nature liferating has been increased for Scandinavia.
Let the Buffing Commence.
To compensate for high overall liferating in Germany, and due to the over-all lategame potential of Burgundy & Bohemia liferating has been nerfed for all German provinces by 1.
Let the Nerfing Commence.
Mining RGO Change
Mining RGO Change
Choose to change a province to the following RGO types, cool down is 25 years for changing, 1 year for not choosing one.
Change a province to produce Coal.
Change a province to produce Iron.
Change a province to produce Sulphur.
I'd rather not change anything.
Argiculture RGO Change
Agriculture RGO Change
Choose to change a province to the following RGO types, cool down is 12.5 years for changing, 1 year for not choosing one. Fish require an available costal province, Timber requires forested terrain.
Change a province to produce Wool.
Change a province to produce Timber.
Change a province to produce Cotton.
Change a province to produce Cattle.
Change a province to produce Fish.
Change a province to produce Fruit.
Change a province to produce Grain.
I'd rather not change anything.
Final Consolidation

The administration of our newly gained Italian holdings finally settled and it was decided to redistribute some power to the restless North Italians. We can now call ourselves the heirs of the Roman Empire.
An Eagles rises.
Beginning of the Regime of Totalitarianism
Although there may have been prior authoritarianism, recent centralization of power has lead to complete absolute rule over all aspects of society.
I am the State!
Totalitarianism
End of Totalitarianism
A recent thaw and the rise of more competition in governance has lead to a less absolutist regime.
Atleast there won't be as many political purges.
Colonial Tech Inheiritance
Uncivilized Puppets gain basic industrial techs to further the out-sourcing of resources.
Isn't this just exploitation of our natural resources?
